Hahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":237691,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ザンス、あんた笑いすぎ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Zansu, you're laughing too much.\""},{"lineNumber":237692,"originalJapaneseLine":"「闘神ダイジェスト！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Toshin Digest!\""},{"lineNumber":237693,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日も始まりました。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It has started again today."},{"lineNumber":237694,"originalJapaneseLine":"　闘神ダイジェストのお時間でーす」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's time for the Toshin Digest.\""},{"lineNumber":237695,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやー、遂に準決勝も終わり。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, the semifinals have finally ended."},{"lineNumber":237696,"originalJapaneseLine":"　残すは決勝戦……","translatedEnglishLine":"Now only the finals remain..."},{"lineNumber":237697,"originalJapaneseLine":"　遂にここまで来たかって感じやね」","translatedEnglishLine":"It really feels like we've finally come this far.\""},{"lineNumber":237698,"originalJapaneseLine":"「闘神都市って大会がやってない間って","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When the Toshin City tournament isn't happening,"},{"lineNumber":237699,"originalJapaneseLine":"　火が消えたように静かになるので、","translatedEnglishLine":"it becomes as quiet as if the fire has gone out,"},{"lineNumber":237700,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだか今から寂しくなっちゃいます」","translatedEnglishLine":"so somehow, I already feel lonely.\""},{"lineNumber":237701,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、その間も大会運営に携わる私は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, even during that time, I who am involved in tournament management,"},{"lineNumber":237702,"originalJapaneseLine":"　来年の闘神大会に向けて","translatedEnglishLine":"am busy with work preparing for next year's Toshin tournament."},{"lineNumber":237703,"originalJapaneseLine":"　仕事山盛りなんですけどね」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have heaps of work, though.\""},{"lineNumber":237704,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さてさて！　それでは皆さん気になる","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then! Now, everyone is curious about"},{"lineNumber":237705,"originalJapaneseLine":"　準決勝の結果についてお話しましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"the results of the semifinals, so let's talk about it.\""},{"lineNumber":237706,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほいほい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, alright.\""},{"lineNumber":237707,"originalJapaneseLine":"「A・Bブロック準決勝、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A and B block semifinals,"},{"lineNumber":237708,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜エール＞・モフスＶＳリクチェル・カラー」","translatedEnglishLine":"<Aile> Mofus vs. Rikucheru Color.\""},{"lineNumber":237709,"originalJapaneseLine":"「正体を現したミスターＸことリクチェル選手と、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mr. X revealed himself—player Rikucheru—and"},{"lineNumber":237710,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜エール＞・モフス選手の戦いです」","translatedEnglishLine":"player <Aile> Mofus's match.\""},{"lineNumber":237711,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞は仲間が呪いにかけられたこともあり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Since a member of <Aile> was cursed,"},{"lineNumber":237712,"originalJapaneseLine":"　負けられない因縁の戦いにもなってもうたね」","translatedEnglishLine":"this became a grudge match where they cannot afford to lose.\""},{"lineNumber":237713,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最初から正体がバレているリクチェル選手、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rikucheru, whose identity was known from the start,"},{"lineNumber":237714,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今回も呪いで攻め立て、","translatedEnglishLine":"attacked with curses again this battle.\""},{"lineNumber":237716,"originalJapaneseLine":"「決着は最後まで倒れなかった、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The outcome was that the player who didn't fall until the end,"},{"lineNumber":237717,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜エール＞選手の勝利となりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"player <Aile>, won.\""},{"lineNumber":237718,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や〜、あの怖い姉ちゃん相手にようやったわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, you did well against that scary lady!\""},{"lineNumber":237719,"originalJapaneseLine":"「パートナー役はリクチェル選手ご本人でしたので、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because the partner role was played by Rikucheru himself,"},{"lineNumber":237720,"originalJapaneseLine":"　乱義選手とのそのパートナー、それから今までに","translatedEnglishLine":"they performed exorcisms on the partner with Rangi,"},{"lineNumber":237721,"originalJapaneseLine":"　呪いをかけられた人の解呪が行われたそうです」","translatedEnglishLine":"and on those who had been cursed up to now.\""},{"lineNumber":237722,"originalJapaneseLine":"「乱義選手のファンの皆さんも安心ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rangi's fans can be relieved as well.\""},{"lineNumber":237723,"originalJapaneseLine":"「C・Dブロック準決勝、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"C and D block semifinals,"},{"lineNumber":237724,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アレキサンダーＶＳ北条早雲」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alexander vs. Hojo Soun.\""},{"lineNumber":237725,"originalJapaneseLine":"「格闘家と陰陽師の戦いに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A fight between a martial artist and an onmyoji,"},{"lineNumber":237726,"originalJapaneseLine":"　当初はアレキサンダー選手の圧勝と","translatedEnglishLine":"was initially expected to be an overwhelming victory for Alexander."},{"lineNumber":237727,"originalJapaneseLine":"　読まれていました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That was the prediction.\""},{"lineNumber":237728,"originalJapaneseLine":"「根本的に魔法使い系は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Basically, magic users"},{"lineNumber":237729,"originalJapaneseLine":"　詠唱に時間かかるさかい、","translatedEnglishLine":"take time to chant spells,"},{"lineNumber":237730,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一騎打ちに向いてないねんな〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"so they aren't suited for one-on-one fights.\""},{"lineNumber":237731,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ところがどっこい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But no way!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、でも、結婚式は挙げたいかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, but I think I want to have a wedding ceremony.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「固まっちまってんぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He's completely frozen..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「乱義のこういう反応は珍しいわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This kind of reaction from Rangi is rare."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ていうか、すごいね乱義……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or rather, it's amazing, Rangi..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眼光一つで女の人、落としたよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You made a woman fall just with a single piercing glance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すみません、僕から言いたいことは終わりです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm sorry, I've finished saying what I wanted to say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それと、貴方と婚姻を結ぶ気はありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, I have no intention of marrying you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では、失礼します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, excuse me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、逃げる気！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, you're trying to run away!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぴゅぴゅぴゅーと乱義は行ってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a swift whoosh, Rangi left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、いっか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, whatever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またチャンスはあるから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There will be another chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、一ミリも諦めてねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I haven't given up even one millimeter..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リクチェルさん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rikucheru-san...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困った人なの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You really are a troublesome person."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だーっはっはっはっはっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Da-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: は、腹痛ぇーーー！　ぎゃははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My stomach hurts so much! Hahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ザンス、あんた笑いすぎ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Zansu, you're laughing too much."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闘神ダイジェスト！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Toshin Digest!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日も始まりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It has started again today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ダイジェストのお時間でーす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's time for the Toshin Digest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、遂に準決勝も終わり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, the semifinals have finally ended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残すは決勝戦……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now only the finals remain...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遂にここまで来たかって感じやね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It really feels like we've finally come this far."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闘神都市って大会がやってない間って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When the Toshin City tournament isn't happening,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火が消えたように静かになるので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it becomes as quiet as if the fire has gone out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか今から寂しくなっちゃいます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so somehow, I already feel lonely."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、その間も大会運営に携わる私は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, even during that time, I who am involved in tournament management,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 来年の闘神大会に向けて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: am busy with work preparing for next year's Toshin tournament.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕事山盛りなんですけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have heaps of work, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さてさて！　それでは皆さん気になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then! Now, everyone is curious about

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 準決勝の結果についてお話しましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the results of the semifinals, so let's talk about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほいほい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, alright."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「A・Bブロック準決勝、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A and B block semifinals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞・モフスＶＳリクチェル・カラー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Aile> Mofus vs. Rikucheru Color."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「正体を現したミスターＸことリクチェル選手と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mr. X revealed himself—player Rikucheru—and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞・モフス選手の戦いです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player <Aile> Mofus's match."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞は仲間が呪いにかけられたこともあり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Since a member of <Aile> was cursed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負けられない因縁の戦いにもなってもうたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this became a grudge match where they cannot afford to lose."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初から正体がバレているリクチェル選手、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rikucheru, whose identity was known from the start,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回も呪いで攻め立て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: attacked with curses again this time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに耐えられるかの戦いとなる＜エール＞選手」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and <Aile> had to endure them in this battle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「決着は最後まで倒れなかった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The outcome was that the player who didn't fall until the end,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞選手の勝利となりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player <Aile>, won."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や〜、あの怖い姉ちゃん相手にようやったわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, you did well against that scary lady!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パートナー役はリクチェル選手ご本人でしたので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because the partner role was played by Rikucheru himself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義選手とのそのパートナー、それから今までに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they performed exorcisms on the partner with Rangi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いをかけられた人の解呪が行われたそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and on those who had been cursed up to now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「乱義選手のファンの皆さんも安心ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rangi's fans can be relieved as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「C・Dブロック準決勝、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "C and D block semifinals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダーＶＳ北条早雲」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander vs. Hojo Soun."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「格闘家と陰陽師の戦いに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A fight between a martial artist and an onmyoji,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当初はアレキサンダー選手の圧勝と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was initially expected to be an overwhelming victory for Alexander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 読まれていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That was the prediction."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「根本的に魔法使い系は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Basically, magic users

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 詠唱に時間かかるさかい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: take time to chant spells,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一騎打ちに向いてないねんな〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so they aren't suited for one-on-one fights."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ところがどっこい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But no way!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

fights.\""},{"lineNumber":237731,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ところがどっこい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But no way!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、でも、結婚式は挙げたいかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, but I think I want to have a wedding ceremony.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「固まっちまってんぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He's completely frozen..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「乱義のこういう反応は珍しいわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This kind of reaction from Rangi is rare."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ていうか、すごいね乱義……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or rather, it's amazing, Rangi..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眼光一つで女の人、落としたよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You made a woman fall just with a single piercing glance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すみません、僕から言いたいことは終わりです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm sorry, I've finished saying what I wanted to say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それと、貴方と婚姻を結ぶ気はありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, I have no intention of marrying you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では、失礼します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, excuse me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、逃げる気！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, you're trying to run away!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぴゅぴゅぴゅーと乱義は行ってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a swift whoosh, Rangi left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、いっか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, whatever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またチャンスはあるから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There will be another chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、一ミリも諦めてねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I haven't given up even one millimeter..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リクチェルさん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rikucheru-san...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困った人なの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You really are a troublesome person."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だーっはっはっはっはっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Da-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: は、腹痛ぇーーー！　ぎゃははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My stomach hurts so much! Hahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ザンス、あんた笑いすぎ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Zansu, you're laughing too much."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闘神ダイジェスト！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Toshin Digest!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日も始まりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It has started again today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ダイジェストのお時間でーす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's time for the Toshin Digest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、遂に準決勝も終わり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, the semifinals have finally ended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残すは決勝戦……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now only the finals remain...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遂にここまで来たかって感じやね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It really feels like we've finally come this far."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闘神都市って大会がやってない間って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When the Toshin City tournament isn't happening,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火が消えたように静かになるので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it becomes as quiet as if the fire has gone out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか今から寂しくなっちゃいます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so somehow, I already feel lonely."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、その間も大会運営に携わる私は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, even during that time, I who am involved in tournament management,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 来年の闘神大会に向けて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: am busy with work preparing for next year's Toshin tournament.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕事山盛りなんですけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have heaps of work, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さてさて！　それでは皆さん気になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then! Now, everyone is curious about

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 準決勝の結果についてお話しましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the results of the semifinals, so let's talk about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほいほい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, alright."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「A・Bブロック準決勝、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A and B block semifinals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞・モフスＶＳリクチェル・カラー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Aile> Mofus vs. Rikucheru Color."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「正体を現したミスターＸことリクチェル選手と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mr. X revealed himself—player Rikucheru—and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞・モフス選手の戦いです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player <Aile> Mofus's match."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞は仲間が呪いにかけられたこともあり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Since a member of <Aile> was cursed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負けられない因縁の戦いにもなってもうたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this became a grudge match where they cannot afford to lose."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初から正体がバレているリクチェル選手、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rikucheru, whose identity was known from the start,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回も呪いで攻め立て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: attacked with curses again this time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに耐えられるかの戦いとなる＜エール＞選手」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and <Aile> had to endure them in this battle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「決着は最後まで倒れなかった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The outcome was that the player who didn't fall until the end,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞選手の勝利となりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player <Aile>, won."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や〜、あの怖い姉ちゃん相手にようやったわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, you did well against that scary lady!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パートナー役はリクチェル選手ご本人でしたので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because the partner role was played by Rikucheru himself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義選手とのそのパートナー、それから今までに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they performed exorcisms on the partner with Rangi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いをかけられた人の解呪が行われたそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and on those who had been cursed up to now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「乱義選手のファンの皆さんも安心ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rangi's fans can be relieved as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「C・Dブロック準決勝、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "C and D block semifinals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダーＶＳ北条早雲」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander vs. Hojo Soun."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「格闘家と陰陽師の戦いに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A fight between a martial artist and an onmyoji,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当初はアレキサンダー選手の圧勝と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was initially expected to be an overwhelming victory for Alexander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 読まれていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That was the prediction."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「根本的に魔法使い系は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Basically, magic users

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 詠唱に時間かかるさかい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: take time to chant spells,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一騎打ちに向いてないねんな〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so they aren't suited for one-on-one fights."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ところがどっこい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But no way!"
